mapper.select: SELECT id, candidate_id AS candidateId, score FROM admissions_interview_score WHERE candidate_id = #{candidateId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admissions_interview_score (candidate_id, score, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{candidateId}, #{score}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS candidateId, c.exam_no AS examNo, c.name AS name, c.major AS major, s.score AS score FROM admissions_interview_score s JOIN admissions_candidate c ON c.id = s.candidate_id ORDER BY s.id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
